risks.divergence_summary: The internal policy excerpt addresses employee-level compliance with existing legal limits but does not acknowledge or outline the organization's obligation to comply with all regulations by the new December 31, 2025 deadline.
risks.conflicting_policy_excerpt: - Employees must comply with their assigned working schedules, record their working time honestly and report any situation likely to exceed legal limits.
risks.new_rule_excerpt: All organizations must comply by December 31, 2025
risks.recommendation: Update the internal policy or related compliance documentation to explicitly reference the new regulation and detail the organization's plan to ensure full compliance by the December 31, 2025 deadline.
